    java.io.Serializable, Cable, NodeListener, InputCable, IOCable, OutputCable

    public class RunnableCable
extends DataCable
    A local cable with type checking.

    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connect(Node sendnode, Node recnode)
      A local cable must be created by giving a reference to a RunnableInstance object so that when we use non-blocking sending of data we can notify the RunnableInstance object when each packet has finished
